org.deeplearning4j.optimize.optimizers

Class NeuralNetworkOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.optimize.optimizers.NeuralNetworkOptimizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IterationListener, OptimizableByGradientValueMatrix
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoEncoderOptimizer, DenoisingAutoEncoderOptimizer, RBMOptimizer

    public abstract class NeuralNetworkOptimizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements OptimizableByGradientValueMatrix, java.io.Serializable, IterationListener
    Performs basic beam search based on the network's loss function
    See Also:
